title: How to Make Jersey Toffee

steps.headline: Melt the butter in the saucepan.
Add the golden syrup and milk.
steps.description: Bring to the boil for 20 minutes, stirring frequently with a wooden spoon.

steps.headline: Add 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla essence.
steps.description: Pour into a tray lined with baking paper. Mark in squares.

steps.headline: Snap or cut squares once set.
steps.description: Keep stored in an airtight container lined with wax paper or baking paper to prevent sticking.

text: Melt the butter in the saucepan. Add the sugar to dissolve. Add the golden syrup and milk. Bring to the boil for 20 minutes, stirring frequently with a wooden spoon. Add 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla essence. Pour into a tray lined with baking paper. Mark in squares. Leave to set.  Snap or cut squares once set. Keep stored in an airtight container lined with wax paper or baking paper to prevent sticking.
